verses.verse: Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH376> that walketh <WH1980> <WH8804> not in the counsel <WH6098> of the ungodly <WH7563>, nor standeth <WH5975> <WH8804> in the way <WH1870> of sinners <WH2400>, nor sitteth <WH3427> <WH8804> in the seat <WH4186> of the scornful <WH3887> <WH8801>.
But his delight <WH2656> is in the Torah <WH8451> of the YY <WH3068>; and in his Torah <WH8451> doth he meditate <WH1897> <WH8799> day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>.

And he shall be like a tree <WH6086> planted <WH8362> <WH8803> by the rivers <WH6388> of water <WH4325>, that bringeth forth <WH5414> <WH8799> his fruit <WH6529> in his season <WH6256>; his leaf <WH5929> also shall not wither <WH5034> <WH8799>; and whatsoever he doeth <WH6213> <WH8799> shall prosper <WH6743> <WH8686>.
The ungodly <WH7563> are not so: but are like the chaff <WH4671> which the wind <WH7307> driveth away <WH5086> <WH8799>.
Therefore the ungodly <WH7563> shall not stand <WH6965> <WH8799> in the judgment <WH4941>, nor sinners <WH2400> in the congregation <WH5712> of the righteous <WH6662>.
For the YY <WH3068> knoweth <WH3045> <WH8802> the way <WH1870> of the righteous <WH6662>: but the way <WH1870> of the ungodly <WH7563> shall perish <WH6> <WH8799>.
